definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: Network tolling is the important part of network administration.
sentences.chinese: 网络收费是网络管理的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The tolls, which include a government passage tax, varied from $4 to $30 per vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 隧道收费连政府通过税，每程由4元至30元不等。

sentences.english: It is right before tollgate entering Jiangsu Province.
sentences.chinese: 就在进入江苏省收费站之前。

sentences.english: They do not charge at all for their services.
At present, hospitals continue to operate on a fee-per-service model.
sentences.chinese: 目前，医院继续采取服务收费的运作模式。

sentences.english: Objective To allocate a full-time toll collector in each medical unit and resolve the disputes due to medical charge.
sentences.chinese: 目的通过设立病区专职收费员，解决收费矛盾。

sentences.english: Objective To allocate a full-time toll collector in each medical unit and resolve the disputes due to medical charge.
sentences.chinese: 目的通过设立病区专职收费员，解决收费矛盾。

sentences.english: The hotel charged 150 dollors a day,the meal is not included.
sentences.chinese: 这家旅馆一天收费一百五十美元，不包括膳食。

sentences.english: They will charge you fifty dollars for a half-hour, and you won't be able to windsurf.
sentences.chinese: 他们半小时收费五十元，你根柢冲不起来。

sentences.english: But we'll go through a tollbooth.
sentences.chinese: 但我们会经过一个收费站。

sentences.english: Today, many publishers are tossing around ideas about charging for their online content.
sentences.chinese: 如今，很多出版商嚷着要对他们的在线新闻收费。

sentences.english: Even with the hefty fees, the organization says it plans only to break even.
sentences.chinese: 即使收费如此巨大，机构称它才刚刚保本。

sentences.english: Next stop is Ping Shan. The end of Zone 4 for single-ride ticket.
sentences.chinese: 下一站系屏山，单程车票第四收费区终止。

sentences.english: Amazon Appstore apps are only available to customers located in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 更绝，无论免费收费，一律只限美国国内下载。

sentences.english: Subsequent portions of pitta bread were charged for.
sentences.chinese: 然后皮塔饼面包般的分量还要收费。

definition: to pay up/to shell out/to hand over the money to cover sth
